name: Lightcloud-b1
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Lightcloud Blue skills offer the convenient voice-control experience using Alexa. To start, you’ll need to pair and configure your lighting devices and Lightcloud Blue Nano using the Lightcloud Blue mobile app. The Lightcloud Blue skill functionality is only available when using the Nano. Next, click the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to begin linking your Lightcloud Blue account.
 
Voice commands can be initiated by stating the desired action and the Area and/or Scene name to action will apply to.
 
Examples of skills to try with voice commands:
 
ON/OFF
Simple on/off functionality available for a single Area or multiple Areas.
Alexa, turn on/off all lights.
Alexa, turn on/off the Living Room lights.
 
DIM LEVEL CONTROL
Manage the brightness of lighting based on the activity.
Alexa, turn on/dim the Living Room lights to 50 percent.
Alexa, dim the Bedroom lights 25 percent.
 
COLOR CONTROL
Create a comfortable atmosphere by adjusting the color temperature.
Alexa, set the Living Room light to warm white.
Alexa, set the Kitchen light to daylight.
 
SCENES
Enable pre-configured Scenes by telling Alexa the name of the Scene.
Alexa, turn on Good Night.
Alexa, turn on Movie Night.
